summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 3, Fern Hill Addition and Block 4, Wabash Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by 46th Avenue Southwest, Erskine Way, West Hudson Street and Heinze Way; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9347 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
